text: BGI may refer to: * Bainbridge Graduate Institute, an MBA program based in Washington State * BGI Group, a genome sequencing company in China * Barclays Global Investors, an asset management business * Grantley Adams International Airport, an airport in Barbados (IATA airport code) * Borland Graphics Interface, a graphics library included with many Borland compiler products in the 1990s * Basic Ground Instructor, a certificate from Federal Aviation Administration
title: BGI
